tool_description: Performs Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) requests to check real-time certificate revocation status, with support for OCSP responder discovery and request signing.

certificate.description: Certificate to check revocation status for

issuer_certificate.description: Issuer certificate needed for OCSP request

ocsp_url.description: OCSP responder URL (auto-discovered from certificate if not provided)

nonce.description: Whether to include nonce in OCSP request for replay protection

validate_response_signature.description: Whether to validate OCSP response signature

error_messages: Invalid certificate: Certificate data is malformed or cannot be parsed.
Invalid issuer certificate: Issuer certificate is malformed or cannot be parsed.
OCSP URL not found: No OCSP responder URL in certificate and none provided.
OCSP request failed: Unable to reach OCSP responder or request timed out.
Invalid OCSP response: Response is malformed or cannot be parsed.
OCSP response signature invalid: Response signature verification failed.
Timeout out of range: Timeout must be between 1 and 120 seconds.
usage: Provide certificate and issuer_certificate. Optionally specify ocsp_url, timeout, and validation options. Returns OCSP response with certificate status.

cert_status.description: Certificate status: good, revoked, or unknown

next_update.description: Time when response information will be updated

revocation_time.description: Time of revocation if certificate is revoked

signature_valid.description: Whether OCSP response signature is valid
